content:
This says that

You can be added to the GitHub and Zulip group for the working group if you are interested in being pinged

That is indeed the case for me. Should I just be filing a PR somewhere to join the ping groups?

Yes, you can add yourself to https://github.com/rust-lang/team/blob/191068112079bf09ef01f32598c87b89a7c792b5/teams/wg-mir-opt.toml#L7 and i'll be able to add you to the zulip team manually once I get to a computer (mobile doesn't have access to settings)
